## Import and transcribe

```python
from catalog.workflow import Library
from catalog.media import Voice
library = Library()

file_path = "data/samples/oz/02.ogg"
file = library.import_media_object(file_path, Voice)

```


```py
from catalog.process import transcribe

transcribe(file)
transcription = file.transcripts[-1]

```


### Inspect result

```python
from catalog.process import format_transcript

text = format_transcript(transcription, sensitivity=0.02, timestamp_interval=30)
print(text)

```


## Set the `Voice` object's `text` attribute

```python
file.set_text()
print(file.text)

```
